alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:23PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN RIPLEY COUNTY THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Greensburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Batesville, Milan, Osgood, Sunman, Napoleon, Millhousen, Ballstown, Penntown, Huntersville and Otter Village. This includes I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 149 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for southeastern Indiana. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
